text: Ezɨ marazi Frigian Distrik ko Pamfilian Provinsɨn ize. Ezɨ marazi Isipɨn kantri, ko Libian Distrighɨn aven itir nguibar ekiam Sairinin boroghɨn ikegha ize. Ezɨ marazi Judan gumazir Romɨn nguibamɨn ikegha izeziba. Marazi Judaba, ezɨ marazi Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba, me Judan Arazibagh amua dar gɨn ghua, egha me uaghan, mati en marasi.
